synopsis.text: Saka the rhythm with the captivating music video for the song "Oka Shika Chika Ika Saka" by the Japanese band SAKANAMON! This animated spectacle graced the screens of NHK's beloved Minna no Uta program, courtesy of talented animator Manabu Himeda. Don't miss out on this delightful fusion of music and animation!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
